title: CourseQuest
description: Participated in a course group project, creating a Course planner focussed to solve the needs of CS Students
Created the app using SOLID principles in Kotlin for Microsoft Windows, complete with installer, testing and functional build system
Enabled fetching available course information from within the app utilizing the University's API
Added pre requisite verification for courses to help users ensure that they meet the requirements
Added a feature for users to sign up and back up their data on the cloud, complete with password recovery

title: CHIP-8 Emulator
description: Made a CHIP-8 Emulator using C++, complete with graphics and input handling
Utilized SDL2 library for graphics, supported all 36 instructions in the set
Achieved fast loadup times with smooth performance

title: Chess
description: Collaborated with two groupmates to make a Chess game in C++
Used OOP principles and utilized X11 library for graphics
Implemented different AI bots with varying difficulty levels, using MinMax and MaxMin algorithms, along with alpha-beta pruning to improve performance

title: Image to ASCII Converter
description: Used stb library in C to make an image to ASCII converter
Added features like inversion, reduced runtie to O(n)
